pageContext.course_type_long_description: Enter the world of Ninjago and become an apprentice Ninjaneer!  Learn the way of Spinjitzu, ride your Elemental Dragon, and face the Great Devourer!  Imagine and build unique and fun projects with the guidance of an experienced Play-Well instructor while exploring the fantasy world of Ninjago.
